articles.title: The 16 Best Books of 2023
articles.description: From a rollicking crypto investigation to an unexpectedly moving novel about poetry-spouting AI, these are the best books we read in 2023.
articles.content: Its hard to find something pithy to say about 2023, a year of dissonant extremes, when wildfires devoured Canadian forests, Twitter withered into X, the Titan submersible imploded into infamy, Silico… [+13055 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Horwitz, Katherine Blunt
articles.title: A ‘Recipe for Disaster’: Insiders Warned Meta’s Privacy Push Would Shield Child Predators
articles.description: The company’s own child-safety experts sounded the alarm about efforts to encrypt messages on Instagram and Facebook. This month, it started doing it anyway.
articles.content:
When Meta Platforms began rolling out encryption for Facebook direct messages this month, it was advancing a project that members of its safety staff have long warned would end in disaster. 
The enc… [+461 chars]

articles.author: Wired
articles.title: The Race to Fill Crypto’s FTX-Shaped Hole
articles.description: When crypto exchange FTX collapsed, it left behind a hole in the market. From Backpack to OPNX, faces new and old are vying to fill it.
articles.content: FTX demonstrated what can go wrong when a crypto exchange is given the latitude to operate in an opaque fashion and with minimal external oversight. It changed what is now expected of other exchanges… [+2468 chars]
